DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter , single arm , observational pilot study assess clinical outcome Strattice Reconstructive Tissue Matrix perineal reconstruction follow eLAPE simultaneous stoma reinforcement .
DOC.brief_title: Perineal Reconstruction Following eLAPE Simultaneous Stoma Sublay Reinforcement
DOC.detailed_description: About 40 subject enrol 4 center approx 24 month . Subjects undergo extralevator abdominoperineal excision concomitant ostomy creation .
DOC.criteria: Primary cancer undergo curative surgery ( R0 ) Life expectancy > 2 yr Neoadjuvant radiotherapy without chemotherapy Pelvic extenteration extend resection Previously irradiate patient ( i.e . radiation therapy previous cancer ) Comorbidities : systemic infection , chronic liver failure , chronic renal failure , HIV , Hepatitis C , advanced/metastatic cancer , collagen disorder sensitivity porcine derive product polysorbate
